  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/112443</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/112443</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Igra za mirne roke</string>
            <string language="en">Steady hand game</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unveränderliches Handspiel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeu régulier de main</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogo constante da mão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gioco costante della mano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σταθερό παιχνίδι χεριών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Juego constante de la mano</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Žarnica v električnem krogu sveti takrat, ko je krog sklenjen. Igra za mirne roke od tekmovalca zahteva, da potuje z obročkom po vijugasti žici tako, da se žice ne dotakne. Ko se žice dotakne, žarnica zasveti.</string>
            <string language="en">How to build on aperture for steady hand game. Useful when teaching electric circuits, electrical conductivity, ...</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">žarnica</string>
            <string language="en">electric bulb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">igra za mirne roke</string>
            <string language="en">steady hand game</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">tokokrog</string>
            <string language="en">circuit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">prevodnost</string>
            <string language="en">conductivity</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie man auf Blendenöffnung für 
unveränderliches Handspiel aufbaut. Nützlich, wenn elektrische
Stromkreise, elektrische Leitfähigkeit... unterrichtet werden</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment construire sur l'ouverture pour le jeu 
régulier de main. Utile en enseignant les circuits 
électriques, conductivité électrique...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como construir na abertura para o jogo constante 
da mão. Útil ao ensinar circuitos elétricos, conductivity 
elétrico...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come costruire sull'apertura per il gioco 
costante della mano. Utile quando insegnano i circuiti 
elettrici, conduttività elettrica...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς να στηριχτεί στο άνοιγμα για το σταθερό παιχνίδι 
χεριών. Χρήσιμος κατά το διδασκαλία των ηλεκτρικών 
κύκλωμα, ηλεκτρική αγωγιμότητα...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo construir en la abertura para el juego 
constante de la mano. Útil al enseñar los circuitos 
eléctricos, conductividad eléctrica...</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrische Birne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unveränderliches Handspiel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stromkreis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leitfähigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ampoule électrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">jeu régulier de main</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">circuit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">conductivité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">bulbo elétrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">jogo constante da mão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">circuito</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">conductivity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lampadina elettrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gioco costante della mano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">circuito</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">conducibilità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρικός βολβός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σταθερό παιχνίδι χεριών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κύκλωμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αγωγιμότητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">bulbo eléctrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">juego constante de la mano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">circuito</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">conductividad</string>
          </keyword>
